title: Conference to honour advocate for social justice activism (University of Windsor)
text: ( Source : University of Windsor ) Windsor Law alumna Marion Overholt ( LLB 1981 ), executive director of Legal Assistance of Windsor and Community Legal Aid, will be honoured for her social justice advocacy this weekend during the national
